entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a person who cannot possess Harry when he is consumed by grief or love.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who would say that it was love, not grief, that drives Voldemort out.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the one from whom Dumbledore wanted Harry to learn control.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to control his pain and grief.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as someone Harry mourns.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone Harry grieved for.

entities.name: malfoys'
entities.description: The Malfoys' is a location where things happened that returned to Harry in the darkness.

entities.name: the wandmaker
entities.description: The Wandmaker is mentioned as someone who has understanding blossom in the darkness.

relationships.description: Voldemort cannot possess Harry when he is consumed by grief or love.
Dumbledore wanted Harry to learn control from Snape.
